name: github-release-consumer
description: A test project for GitHub Actions deployment workflow

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:rollup && npm run build:types
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin main && git push origin --tags
